description: This table contains information about transport requests.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the transport request record.

columns.name: TRANSPORT_NAME
columns.description: The name of the transport request record.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient to be transported.

columns.name: TXPORT_PAT_CSN
columns.description: The unique contact serial number of the patient associated with this transport request. This is optional as there may not be a particular patient contact that the transport request is linked to.

columns.name: TXPORT_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transport type category number for the transport request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Patient


Non-patient


Cleaning Inspection


Non-patient Bundle

columns.name: TXPORT_DATE
columns.description: The date on which the transport request needs to be completed.

columns.name: TXPORT_TIME
columns.description: The time at which the transport request needs to be completed.

columns.name: TXPORT_FROM_PLF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient location facility record from where the patient is being transported.

columns.name: TXPORT_TO_PLF_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient location facility record where the patient is being transported to.

columns.name: ROUND_TRIP_YN
columns.description:
Flag to indicate if this is a round trip request. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: TXPORT_MODE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The transport mode category number for the transport request.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes

columns.name: REQUEST_SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the transport request.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Ad-Hoc


Transfer


Discharge


Admission


Scheduling


System generated


Leave of Absence

columns.name: REQ_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who created the transport request.

columns.name: LOC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the location record that the transport request is for.

columns.name: CANCEL_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the user who canceled the transport request.

columns.name: CANCEL_EVENT_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time when a transport request was canceled.

columns.name: PRIORITY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The priority of the transport request. 


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Stat


High


Normal


Low

columns.name: RECORD_CREATION_DT
columns.description: The date on which the transport request was created.

columns.name: RND_TRIP_RETURN_ID
columns.description: This item contains the linked return transport request for a round trip request.

columns.name: RND_TRIP_ORIG_ID
columns.description: This item contains the linked original transport request for a round trip request.

columns.name: TXPORT_FROM_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates if the patient is to be picked up at their current location or an override location specified.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Use current location


Use override location


Use current bed

columns.name: TXPORT_TO_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates if the patient is to be dropped off at their currently occupied bed or to a specific location.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Use specified location


Back to bed

columns.name: CURRENT_STATUS_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item indicates the current status of the request.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Pending


Assigned


In Progress


Delayed


Completed


Canceled


Future


Postponed


Acknowledged

columns.name: TXPORT_ADMIT_CSN
columns.description: This item contains the contact serial number (CSN) of the admission contact.  This is optional as there may not be a current admission contact for the patient.

columns.name: PARENT_REQUEST_ID
columns.description: This item contains the parent transporter request of a multiple transporter request.

columns.name: ASSOCIATED_BEV_ID
columns.description: This item contains the linked bed clean request (if any).

columns.name: REGION_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the region record that the transport request is for.

columns.name: REGION_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this cleaning sector.

columns.name: TXPORT_PAT_OUT_CSN
columns.description: This item contains the contact serial number (CSN) of the patient contact that is linked to this transport request if the request is an outgoing request from an appointment. This may not always be populated if the request is not linked to an appointment contact.

columns.name: SECTOR_ID
columns.description: This item contains the sector that the transport request is in.

columns.name: SECTOR_ID_RECORD_NAME
columns.description: The name of this cleaning sector.

columns.name: COMP_ACTION_RSLT_C_NAME
columns.description:
Holds the result of the attempt to transfer or discharge a patient.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Completed Successfully


Failed - Patient Locked


Failed - Validation Errors


Transported Patient Successful - Linked Patients Failed


Transported Patient Failed - Linked Successful


Failed - Primary and Linked Patients


Failed - Patient has Earlier Pending Transfers

columns.name: REQ_DEP_ID
columns.description: This item records the user's log in department when creating the request.

columns.name: TXPORT_PHONE_NUM
columns.description: This item contains the phone number associated with the transport request, stored as a short free-text string.

columns.name: TNP_CREATE_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
Specifies what made the request be created


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Manual


Appointment


Ready To Move

columns.name: BED_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
This item tracks the bed type associated with this transport request.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Empty


Standard


Crib


Telemetry


Bariatric

columns.name: TXPORT_HOUR_OF_DAY_C_NAME
columns.description:
The hour of day category value that the transport was last set to a pending status. Note this is a category value that is often joined to ZC_HOUR_OF_DAY.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


00:00


01:00


02:00


03:00


04:00


05:00


06:00


07:00


08:00


09:00


10:00


11:00


12:00


13:00


14:00


15:00


16:00


17:00


18:00


19:00


20:00


21:00


22:00


23:00

columns.name: FOLLOW_UP_SOURCE_TRANSPORT_ID
columns.description: Holds the transport request record that triggered the creation of this follow-up task.
